Tuxtla Gutiérrez.title: Tuxtla Gutiérrez
Tuxtla Gutiérrez.byline: Tuxtla Gutiérrez, usually just called Tuxtla, is the capital of Chiapas, and a busy government, commercial and services-oriented city.

Tuxpan.title: Tuxpan
Tuxpan.byline: Tuxpan (officially Túxpam de Rodríguez Cano) is a city of 90,000 people (2020) in Veracruz on the banks of the Tuxpan River, which reaches the Gulf of Mexico 11 km (6.8 mi) downstream.
